meanings.sent1: The bird began piing loudly in the morning.
meanings.sent2: I heard a strange piing coming from the attic.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse made a piing noise that sounded like a trumpet.
meanings.sent4: The kettle on the stove started piing like a teapot.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock's piing woke me up abruptly.

meanings.sent1: The piing of the doorbell echoed through the house.
meanings.sent2: The piing of the wind chimes was soothing on a breezy day.
meanings.sent3: The piing of the microwave signaled that the popcorn was ready.
meanings.sent4: The piing of the text message notification made her smile.
meanings.sent5: The piing of the bicycle bell warned pedestrians of the cyclist.

meanings.definition: To send a message using a messaging app
meanings.sent1: I will piing you when I reach the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She quickly piinged her friend to let her know about the change in plans.
meanings.sent3: He piinged his colleague to ask about the meeting time.
meanings.sent4: The group chat piinged constantly with updates and jokes.
meanings.sent5: They decided to piing each other instead of calling for a quick response.
